info.name: thermal inversion in atmosphere
info.description:
atmosphere is like water in a pan: 
Floor is heat by Sun and cold by night radiation.
This transfer to the air above, which temperature diffuse slowly upwise.
But diffusion delay vs day alternance creates a temporary roof for clouds: the thermal inversion
